meanings.definition: Used to refer to oneself as the object of a verb or preposition.
meanings.sent1: My mom gave me a cookie.
meanings.sent2: Can you pass me the book?
meanings.sent3: The cat brought me a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun shines on me like a spotlight.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to oneself as the indirect object of a verb.
meanings.sent1: My friend made me a card.
meanings.sent2: She baked me a cake for my birthday.
meanings.sent3: The dog fetched me a stick.
meanings.sent4: Her words hit me like a wave.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to oneself as the subject of a verb.
meanings.sent1: I like when my friends visit me.
meanings.sent2: Me and my sister play together.
meanings.sent3: The mirror showed me a funny face.
meanings.sent4: The wind whispers secrets to me.
meanings.sent5: The stars above watch over me.
